divs: Sighting Details Me and my wife were on our way to my parents house. Driving south, I noticed a bright red light motionless in the sky. I pointed it out to my wife, who also seen the object. It took approximately ten minutes to drive to my parents, and we visited for roughly a half an hour. Leaving their house, I noticed the object was still visible, and in the same location. I decided that if it was still there by the time we got home, I would take my camera and try to get a photo. Arriving home, I ran into the house and grabbed my camera. By this time the object had been in the sky, and in the same location about fifty minutes. I drove west, to a grocery store parking lot, and snapped a couple of photos. I could only get two, because the clouds were rolling in. The photos show what I seen, a bright red light. I have tried to zoom in on the photos, but cannot make out a solid shape. This could just be some sort of light reflecting off of something, I don't know. I would be interested in your opinion.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hazel Park
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Noticed a red triangular object in the sky, NNW. It was motionless for at least an hour.
